Name: Average time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of SW-AE Assign Reviewers when followed by multiple reviewer invitations (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and the end of case where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurs

Name: Total time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Declined compared to the time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time it takes SW-AE Assign Reviewers to be completed in variants that eventually reach SW-Reviewer Agreed versus those that end in SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Elapsed time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and the first occurrence of any reviewer response activity (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in complex variants involving repeated assignments and editor changes before SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between consecutive executions of SW-AE Assign Reviewers within the same case until SW-Reviewer Agreed is recorded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that result in a final decision of SW-EIC Major Revision
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time of SW-AE Assign Reviewers measured as the interval between its timestamp and the timestamp of the immediately preceding activity in each variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-AE Assign Reviewers and the end of the case

Name: Total time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs but no further reviewer actions follow
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-AE Assign Reviewers when it appears multiple times before achieving SW-Reviewer Agreed, considering only variants aligned with ACM journal review rigor standards
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name to identify outlier cases with unusually long assignment-to-agreement intervals
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'maximum', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
